The Tate-Shafarevich group of $E _ { D ^ { \prime } }$ can now be defined as

$$
\mathrm { I I I } ( E _ { D ^ { \prime } } ) = \{ x \in H ^ { 1 } ( G _ { \mathbb { Q } } , E _ { D ^ { \prime } } ( \overline { { \mathbb { Q } } } ) ) ~ | ~ r e s _ { p } ( x ) = 0 ~ f o r ~ a l l ~ p \} .

Remark 2.2.
